parameters.text:
=Agent can only select 1 time slot.

{{ JSON.stringify($('Code in JavaScript').item.json) }}

options.systemMessage:
=You are tasked with creating a Tally form based on the user's requirements. Use the "Tally MCP" tool to create a form where users can select a preferred date and time from a list of options. Ensure the form includes:

A title that reflects the purpose of the form (e.g., "Aloha, please select your available time to show the property. Mahalo") (Required).

Multiple date options, each with a corresponding label (e.g., "Monday, January 15th, 2024, 10am" and so on) (Required).

Add 1 field Phone number (Required).

Once created, return the id of the form you created as output only (Required).

WARNING: DO NOT CREATE ANY EXTRA THINGS, DO NOT add country code.

parameters.name: message
parameters.value:
=This is the Form Link for selecting time slots.
{{ $('Create Agent record').item.json.fields['Agent Form URL'] }}

nodes.name: Send Tally Link to Agents by SMS

parameters.content:
## 1: Tagging
### Form is Submitted and Human Readable from Data is also stored in Airtable

## 2: AI Agent
### Generate Tally Form for Agents

## 3: URL and Webhook
### Store Tally Form URL and also create a Webhook

## 0: Trigger
### This Webhook will trigger when the Owner/Tenant Submit Tally Form

## 4: Sending SMS to Showing Agents
### 1. Get the Exact record for the Selected Property
### 2. Get all Showing Agents Contacts
### 3. process to extract First Name and Number

options.systemMessage:
You are a helpful assistant in Extracting and returning the name and phone number of every showing Agents given as input in structured format.
Important: The phone numbers format will be this "808-218-9054"

main.node: Send Tally Link to Agents by SMS
